name: MrBeast Burger Simulator
description:
A small Restaurant-Managing fan-made game where you play as MrBeast or as one of his friends to cook food and serve customers, your restaurant will be crowded with people asking for food and money, you have to cook and serve as fast as possible!

Every level you play gives you the ability to add your OWN burgers to the list so you can sell it to the customers.

You can increase your score by:-

- adding the right ingredients                                          - adding the ingredients in order

- the patty/bacon being cooked                                      - more burgers on the list

- more money you add to the burger (max 2)                  - customer's green bubble

Controls: 

-WASD: movement

-LEFT CLICK: Pick-up, replace

-RIGHT CLICK: Drop, Add ingredient

-TAB: Check the menu

-SHIFT: Sprint

-F11: Fullscreen

NOTE: The downloadable version of this game is better than the web version in almost every way, if you want the full experience please play the downloadable version instead.
